en.title: Ansible – Lesson 8: Playbook Basics
en.subtitle: Understanding what playbooks are, their structure, hosts, and tasks

sections.heading: 1. What is an Ansible Playbook?
sections.content: An Ansible playbook is a YAML file where you define automation steps to be executed on managed servers.

sections.heading: 2. Why Playbooks are Important?
sections.content: Playbooks allow you to automate complex tasks in a repeatable and consistent way.

sections.heading: 3. Playbook File Extension
sections.content: Ansible playbooks are saved with .yml or .yaml extension.

sections.heading: 4. Basic Structure of a Playbook
sections.content: A playbook contains hosts, become, tasks and modules written in YAML format.

sections.heading: 5. What is a Play?
sections.content: A play is a set of tasks executed on a specific group of hosts.

sections.heading: 6. Understanding Hosts in Playbook
sections.content: Hosts define which group of servers the playbook will run on.

sections.heading: 7. What is a Task?
sections.content: A task is a single automation step such as installing a package or starting a service.

sections.heading: 8. Using Modules in Tasks
sections.content: Each task uses a module like apt, yum, service, copy, shell, etc.

sections.heading: 9. Example Simple Playbook
sections.content: --- name: Install nginx hosts: web become: yes tasks: - name: Install nginx apt: name=nginx state=present

sections.heading: 10. Running a Playbook
sections.content: Use the command: ansible-playbook playbook.yml

sections.heading: 11. What is Become (sudo)?
sections.content: Become allows Ansible to run tasks with root privileges using sudo.

sections.heading: 12. Playbook Idempotency
sections.content: Ansible ensures idempotency, meaning running the same playbook multiple times will not change the result unnecessarily.

sections.heading: Lesson 8 Summary
sections.content: You learned what playbooks are, their structure, how tasks work, and how to run a simple playbook.

ta.title: Ansible – பாடம் 8: Playbook அடிப்படைகள்
ta.subtitle: Playbook என்றால் என்ன, அதன் structure, hosts, tasks பற்றி

sections.heading: 1. Ansible Playbook என்றால் என்ன?
sections.content: Playbook என்பது automation steps எழுதப்படும் YAML file ஆகும்.

sections.heading: 2. Playbook ஏன் முக்கியம்?
sections.content: Complex automation-ஐ repeatable & consistent-ஆக செய்ய playbooks உதவுகின்றன.

sections.heading: 3. Playbook File Extension
sections.content: .yml அல்லது .yaml extension-ல் playbook save செய்ய வேண்டும்.

sections.heading: 4. Playbook Structure
sections.content: Hosts, become, tasks, modules ஆகியவை playbook-ல் இருக்கும்.

sections.heading: 5. Play என்றால் என்ன?
sections.content: ஒரு group of hosts-க்கு run ஆகும் tasks தொகுப்பே play ஆகும்.

sections.heading: 6. Hosts என்றால் என்ன?
sections.content: எந்த server group-ல் playbook run ஆக வேண்டும் என்பதை hosts define செய்யும்.

sections.heading: 7. Task என்றால் என்ன?
sections.content: Install, start service போன்ற ஒவ்வொரு step-ம் task ஆகும்.

sections.heading: 8. Module பயன்பாடு
sections.content: apt, yum, service, copy, shell போன்ற modules task-களில் பயன்படுத்தப்படுகின்றன.

sections.heading: 9. Simple Playbook Example
sections.content: nginx install செய்யும் basic example playbook structure.

sections.heading: 10. Playbook Run செய்வது
sections.content: ansible-playbook playbook.yml command பயன்படுத்த வேண்டும்.

sections.heading: 11. Become (sudo) என்றால் என்ன?
sections.content: Root privilege-ஆக command run செய்ய become பயன்படுத்தப்படுகிறது.

sections.heading: 12. Idempotency
sections.content: ஒரே playbook-ஐ மீண்டும் மீண்டும் run செய்தாலும் output same தான் இருக்கும்.

sections.heading: Lesson 8 Summary
sections.content: Playbook basics, structure, tasks மற்றும் run செய்வது பற்றி நீங்கள் கற்றுக்கொண்டீர்கள்.
